backend/main.mo: Defines trading, wallet, deposit, bonus, fee, and user profile types, initializes maps, and provides access-controlled profile and M-Pesa number management.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting the old actor state to the new structure by adding a default M-Pesa number field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing affected frontend files and components for updating the M-Pesa instructions UI using the backend-provided destination number.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their roles across hooks, components, pages, and UI modules.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining theme variables for light/dark modes and applying base visual styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point containing the root mount element and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, theme provider, authentication gating, and profile setup dialog rendering.
frontend/src/components/admin/BonusManag: Admin UI for viewing bonuses and applying new bonuses to users with form inputs and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/DepositReq: Displays pending deposit requests with M-Pesa details and allows admins to approve or reject them via dialog actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/RevenuePan: Shows total platform revenue and lists recent trading fee events with timestamps and amounts.
frontend/src/components/admin/TradingSta: Provides trade statistics and a table of recent trades including direction, margin, status, and P&L.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserDirect: Aggregates all users from trades and deposits and lets admins inspect user-specific activity.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserInspec: Displays detailed activity for a specific user including trades, deposits, bonuses, fees, and summary stats.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Simple screen informing the user of access denial with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout state and renders an auth button with loading handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for new users to set a display name and create their profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, navigation, mobile menu, authentication-aware links, and routed content.
frontend/src/components/trading/OpenTrad: Renders a table of open trades with details and an action to close each trade.
frontend/src/components/trading/TradeHis: Displays closed trade history with pricing, P&L, fees, and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/trading/TradeTic: Provides a form for opening trades, allowing users to pick pair, direction, leverage, and margin.
frontend/src/components/wallet/DepositFo: Form for submitting deposit requests, including M-Pesa details when applicable.
frontend/src/components/wallet/MpesaInst: Shows M-Pesa deposit or withdrawal instructions and retrieves the M-Pesa number.
frontend/src/components/wallet/RequestsH: Combines deposits, bonuses, and fees into a unified transaction history table.
frontend/src/components/wallet/WithdrawF: Form component for submitting withdrawal requests via M-Pesa or bank transfer using useWithdrawFunds.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBonuses.ts: Provides hooks to fetch bonuses and apply new bonuses, with cache invalidation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hooks for fetching the caller’s user profile, role, admin status, and available balance from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useFees.ts: Hooks to fetch trading fees and platform revenue and submit new trading fees with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, login state, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook for fetching all backend data using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrading.ts: Hooks for opening, closing, and retrieving trades with automatic cache invalidation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useWallet.ts: Wallet management hooks for deposits, withdrawals, M-Pesa number retrieval, and admin approvals with cache updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining light and dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard showing stats, navigation tabs, and admin-only management panels with authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page displaying platform features, hero section, and navigation to trading.
frontend/src/pages/TradingPage.tsx: Authenticated trading interface showing balance, open trades, P&L, and trade ticket with tabbed views.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Wallet management page showing balance, bonuses, fees, and providing deposit, withdraw, and history views.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, typography, container settings, and plugins for styling the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the app’s project state, including features for trading, wallet operations, M-Pesa manual payments, bonuses, monetization, and admin tools, along with notes and issues.
